mapper.select: SELECT A.ItemID AS "ItemID" , A.Item AS "Item" , A.QuestionID AS "QuestionID" , B.SurveyID AS "SurveyID" , B.Subject AS "Subject" , B.Description AS "Description" , B.RegistDate AS "RegistDate" , B.respondentYn AS "respondentYn" , B.totCnt AS "totCnt" , ((SELECT COUNT(AnswerID) FROM survey_question_item_answer C WHERE C.ItemID = A.ItemID) / DECODE(totCnt * 100, 0, '', totCnt * 100)) AS rate FROM survey_question_item A JOIN (SELECT A.SurveyID, A.Subject, A.Description, LOWER(TO_CHAR(A.RegistDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) AS RegistDate, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(RespondentID) FROM survey_respondent C WHERE C.SurveyID = A.SurveyID AND RespondentCode = #{userId}) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS respondentYn, (SELECT COUNT(AnswerID) FROM survey_question_item_answer D WHERE D.SurveyID = A.SurveyID) AS totCnt FROM survey A LEFT JOIN survey_question B ON A.SurveyID = B.SurveyID WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN SurveyStartDate AND SurveyEndDate AND State = 'F' AND QuestionCount = 1 AND QuestionType = 'S' AND Fn_SurveyTargetRespondent_R(A.SurveyID, #{userId}) = 'Y' AND ROWNUM <= 1 ORDER BY RegistDate DESC ) B ON A.SurveyID = B.SurveyID ORDER BY rate DESC, ItemNO ASC
